biography.value:
Beholder

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.ROov3E2qOiEfjDXM caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

Beholder Lairs

@Embed[Compendium.dnd-monster-manual.content.JournalEntry.mmAppendixMonste.JournalEntryPage.KR7cEJQa2N3FpOsS caption=false cite=false classes="no-embed mm"]

description.value: If the [[lookup @name lowercase]] fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s central eye emits an antimagic wave in a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]] [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=7vRTku30dhIyBf68]]. Until the start of the beholderâ€™s next turn, that area acts as an @UUID[Compendium.dnd-players-handbook.spells.Item.phbsplAntimagicF] spell, and that area works against the [[lookup @name lowercase]]'s own Eye Rays.

The [[lookup @name lowercase]] randomly shoots one of the following magical rays at a target it can see within 120 feet of itself (roll [[/r 1d10]]; reroll if the beholder has already used that ray during this turn):

Eye Rays

1: Charm Ray.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=dcpGMW2jBewtY5lx]] or until it takes damage.

Success: Half damage only.

2: Paralyzing Ray.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]].

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After [[lookup @duration.value activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=EZ5rsyCFKBY3TWww]], it succeeds automatically.

3: Fear Ray.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=aMfevxGsYy5swVDA]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

Success: Half damage only.

4: Slowing Ray.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=lq2AtXFOVBz6IHMh]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=lq2AtXFOVBz6IHMh]] damage. Until the end of the targetâ€™s next turn, the targetâ€™s Speed is halved; the target canâ€™t take &Reference[Reaction]{Reactions}; and it can take either an action or a &Reference[BonusAction] on its turn, not both.

Success: Half damage only.

5: Enervation Ray.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=9srzVFm9txeDeMFf]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=9srzVFm9txeDeMFf]] damage, and the target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn. While Poisoned, the target canâ€™t regain Hit Points.

Success: Half damage only.

6: Telekinetic Ray.

Strength Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]] (the target succeeds automatically if it is Gargantuan).

Failure: The [[lookup @name lowercase]] moves the target up to [[lookup @target.template.size activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]] [[lookup @target.template.units activity=a5zT8E1cS4yBVodK]]. in any direction. The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition until the start of the [[lookup @name lowercase]]â€™s next turn or until the beholder has the Incapacitated condition. The [[lookup @name lowercase]] can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a tool or opening a door or container.

7: Sleep Ray.

Wisdom Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=CSKrXM1Pkhlf23et]] (the target succeeds automatically if it is a Construct or an Undead).

Failure: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for [[lookup @duration.value activity=CSKrXM1Pkhlf23et]] [[lookup @duration.units activity=CSKrXM1Pkhlf23et]]. The condition ends if the target takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

8: Petrification Ray.

Constitution Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=q67AgIfRplRO2e9p]]. First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success. Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

9: Disintegration Ray.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]] damage. If the target is a nonmagical object or a creation of magical force, a [[lookup @target.template.size activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]]-[[lookup @target.template.units activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]]. [[lookup @target.template.type capitalize activity=A5PdqZCq1yeIN8m4]] of it disintegrates into dust.

Success: Half damage.

Failure or Success: If the target is a creature and this damage reduces it to 0 Hit Points, it disintegrates into dust.

10: Death Ray.

Dexterity Saving Throw: DC [[lookup @save.dc.value activity=yjLvFKZIWfUCIT73]].

Failure: [[/damage average activity=yjLvFKZIWfUCIT73]] damage.

Success: [[lookup @damage.onSave capitalize activity=yjLvFKZIWfUCIT73]] damage.

Failure or Success: The target dies if the ray reduces it to 0 Hit Points.

effects.name: Charmed
effects.description: The target has the &Reference[Charmed apply=false] condition for 1 hour or until it takes damage.

effects.name: Paralyzed
effects.description: The target has the &Reference[Paralyzed apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

effects.name: Frightened
effects.description: The target has the &Reference[Frightened apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

effects.name: Poisoned
effects.description: The target has the &Reference[Poisoned apply=false] condition until the end of its next turn.

effects.name: Unconscious
effects.description: The target has the &Reference[Unconscious apply=false] condition for 1 minute.

effects.name: Restrained
effects.description: First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn.

effects.name: Restrained
effects.description: First Failure: The target has the &Reference[Restrained apply=false] condition and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success.

effects.name: Petrified
effects.description: Second Failure: The target has the &Reference[Petrified apply=false] condition instead of the Restrained condition.

effects.name: Half Speed/No Reactions
effects.description: Until the end of the targetâ€™s next turn, the targetâ€™s Speed is halved; the target canâ€™t take &Reference[Reaction]{Reactions}; and it can take either an action or a &Reference[BonusAction] on its turn, not both.

effects.name: Half Speed/No Reactions (Copy)
effects.description: Until the end of the targetâ€™s next turn, the targetâ€™s Speed is halved; the target canâ€™t take &Reference[Reaction]{Reactions}; and it can take either an action or a &Reference[BonusAction] on its turn, not both.
